name: 100% Natural Detergent from Fruit - 1 oz.
description:
* * * THIS SHOP HAS BEEN MOVED TO WWW.STUDIOOMSHOP.COM. PLEASE VISIT US! :) * * * Would you rather use a 100% natural detergent that is hypoallergenic, safe on fine fabrics, super easy on the environment, and costs less than most major detergents? This is exactly what these little shells are! These shells have been used overseas for centuries to clean laundry, dishes, and even the body! This detergent:
  • Is hypoallergenic - people with skin allergies and sensitivities can use this product (safe for people with nut allergies - soapnuts are not botanically related to the nut family),


  • Is also safe for linen, silk, and wool, and


  • Reduces the amount of toxins that are produced both inside and outside of the home.
For this listing, you will receive 1 full ounce of soapnut pieces, 1 reusable cotton bag, and directions for soapnut use. This is enough for up to 24 loads of laundry! *Check out "About Soapnuts" under "Info" to the right for more soapnut info!
